SELECT CompanyCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain d JOIN covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_mst m ON d.DomainCode = m.CompanyCode WHERE 1=1
AND OthYn = #{OthYn}
SELECT SettingValue FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_config a JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain b ON a.DomainID = B.DomainId AND b.DomainCode = #{CompanyCode} WHERE SETTINGKEY = 'AttBatchDeviceName'

SELECT SettingValue FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_config a JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain b ON a.DomainID = B.DomainId AND b.DomainCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{CompanyCode}) AND a.SETTINGKEY = 'AttendanceBatchDay' ORDER BY CASE WHEN b.DomainCode = #{CompanyCode} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(workdate,'%Y-%m-%d') workdate ,usercode ,CASE WHEN wstime != '' THEN DATE_FORMAT(wstime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END wstime ,CASE WHEN wctime != '' THEN DATE_FORMAT(wctime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END wctime ,startbatch ,endbatch ,commuSeq ,AttConfirmYn FROM ( SELECT workdate ,targetdate ,u.usercode ,wstime ,starttime ,wctime ,endtime ,IF(wstime = '' or wstime>=starttime OR StartChangeYn = 'Y' ,NULL,'Y') startbatch ,IF(wctime = '' or wctime <= endtime OR EndChangeYn = 'Y',NULL,'Y') endbatch ,commuSeq ,AttConfirmYn FROM ( SELECT distinct WorkDate , WSTime ,WCTime ,Sabun ,bWS ,bWC FROM legacy_secom.${CompanyCode}_t_secom_workhistory WHERE ( bWS = 1 OR bWC= 1 ) AND Sabun != '' AND WorkDate >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{batchDate} DAY),'%Y%m%d') ) secom JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user u ON secom.sabun = u.EmpNo JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup soub ON U.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND soub.JobType ='Origin' AND soub.CompanyCode =#{CompanyCode} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT acm.UserCode ,acm.AttConfirmYn ,acm.StartChangeYn ,acm.EndChangeYn ,acm.AttStartTime StartTime ,acm.AttEndTime EndTime ,acm.TargetDate ,acm.CommuSeq FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_commuting_mst acm WHERE acm.TargetDate >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{batchDate} DAY),'%Y%m%d') ) att ON u.UserCode = att.UserCode AND secom.workdate = att.TargetDate ) A WHERE (startbatch IS NOT NULL OR endbatch IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY workdate ASC
